Package org.apache.flume.auth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FlumeAuthenticator
    FlumeAuthenticator extends on a PrivilegedExecutor providing capabilities to proxy as a different user
    PrivilegedExecutor
    PrivilegedExecutor provides the ability to execute a PrivilegedAction or a PrivilegedExceptionAction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlumeAuthenticationUtil
    FlumeAuthentication utility class that provides methods to get an Authenticator.
    KerberosUser
    Simple Pair class used to define a unique (principal, keyTab) combination.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SecurityException
    SecurityException thrown in the Flume security module
